QuestData.Title: Done with Waiting
QuestData.Description: Mom got a message and said blood called for blood. She told me to wait here while she went out, but it's been two weeks since then. I'm tired of waiting.$B$BI'll stay home if you go find her. She said she was going to the cliffs far to the south.
QuestData.LogDescription: Travel to the southern cliffs of Val'sharah and speak to Makra Knifewhisper.
